name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: May Senator Carl Levin‚Äôs memory be a blessing and may his legacy live forever on in the hearts of Michiganders, and those who he inspired.

name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: Rob and I are sending all of our love and prayers to the entire Levin family, especially his wife Barbara, children, brother Sandy, and my wonderful colleague Andy Levin.

name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: His confidence in me is something that I cherish and will always carry with me.

name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: There is no one like Senator Carl Levin, and there will never be another like him. He was a hero to me, and so many people he worked with and inspired. I will never forget November 1, 2018, when he told a room full of people "Haley can do this."

name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: Senator Levin was not one to play political games, but one to always stand up for what was right. Former Senator McCain said it best: "We all listen to him, and we listen closest to him on the occasions when we disagree with him."

name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: What really stands out when thinking about Senator Levin‚Äôs legacy was the respect that he garnered across both sides of the aisle; he showed how progress can still be possible when we stick to our convictions but also insist on coming together as Americans.

name: Rep. Haley Stevens

name: Rep. Haley Stevens
tweet_text: I have never participated in a more powerful moment of silence for such an incredible individual. The 116th Congress got to serve with John Lewis. Our Congress will never be the same. https://t.co/vOiI4t7alP
